name: Potsu Potsu
description:
Submission for the "Game by its Cover Jam" 2018

Original concept by Sean Suchara (@sean_suchara) (Art on the wall also by Sean, thank you!)

"Potsu Potsu is a visual/audio synthesizer where players simulate a rainy day stuck indoors. The TV becomes an imaginary window into a rainy world as players control the patterns/intensity of the rain and the materials of the roof it lands on."

---HOW TO PLAY---

WASD/ZQSD - Move

Mouse - Look around

Right Mouse Button near the synthesizer to sit down

Left Mouse Button to click or drag the different Knobs and Buttons to discover their use

Escape to leave
